alert.note: Alert for Coastal Miami Dade County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 5:16PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Miami-Dade County through 545 PM EDT... At 516 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Kendall, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Miami, Coral Gables, South Miami, Kendall, Pinecrest, Sweetwater, West Miami, Westchester, Glenvar Heights, Richmond West, Richmond Heights, Kendale Lakes, University Of Miami, Zoo Miami, Coconut Grove, Coral Terrace, Olympia Heights, West Kendall, Sunset and Marlins Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Miami Dade County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metropolitan Miami Dade
